source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a time-lapse video of a massive, rotating supercell thunderstorm. The dark, ominous clouds churn and swirl rapidly across the sky, showcasing the storm's immense power and movement. The entire weather system evolves over the flat landscape as light and shadow shift dramatically.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a time-lapse video of a massive, rotating supercell thunderstorm. The dark, ominous clouds churn and swirl rapidly across the sky, showcasing the storm's immense power and movement. The entire weather system evolves over the flat landscape as light and shadow shift dramatically.

generated_critique: The caption should mention that several birds can be seen flying through the storm clouds during the time-lapse, which adds another layer of motion to the scene.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This is a time-lapse video of a massive, rotating supercell thunderstorm. The dark, ominous clouds churn and swirl rapidly across the sky, showcasing the storm's immense power and movement. Several birds can be seen flying through the storm clouds, adding another layer of motion to the scene. The entire weather system evolves over the flat landscape as light and shadow shift dramatically.
